item.title: Document Formating
item.description: Showcase of sample document and content formating using various available method, heading (6 styles), blockquote, images, embeded media (youtube, vimeo, etc). Element code and many more. This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a theme.
